sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import {
  Box,
  Button,
  Container,
  Grid,
  Paper,
  Typography
} from '@mui/material';

const data = {
  currentValue: 100000,
  investedAmount: 90000,
  xirr: 12,
  oneDayReturn: 0.5,
  profitLoss: 10000,
};

export default function App() {
  return (
    <Container maxWidth="sm">
      <Box
        sx={{
          background: 'linear-gradient(180deg, #7b2ff7, #f107a3)',
          color: 'white',
          py: 6,
          borderTopLeftRadius: 8,
          borderTopRightRadius: 8,
          textAlign: 'center',
        }}
      >
        <Typography variant="subtitle2">Current Value</Typography>
        <Typography variant="h4" fontWeight="bold">
          ₹ {data.currentValue.toLocaleString()}
        </Typography>
        <Typography sx={{ mt: 1 }}>
          ↑ ₹ {data.profitLoss.toLocaleString()} (
          {((data.profitLoss / data.investedAmount) * 100).toFixed(0)}%)
        </Typography>
      </Box>

      <Paper
        elevation={4}
        sx={{
          mx: 2,
          mt: 4,
          borderRadius: 3,
          overflow: 'hidden',
          px: 2,
          pb: 2,
          textAlign: 'center',
        }}
      >
        <Typography sx={{ mt: 2 }}>Invested</Typography>
        <Typography variant="h6" fontWeight="bold">
          ₹ {data.investedAmount.toLocaleString()}
        </Typography>

        <Grid container spacing={2} justifyContent="center" sx={{ mt: 2 }}>
          <Grid item>
            <Typography variant="body2">XIRR</Typography>
            <Typography variant="body1">{data.xirr}%</Typography>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item>
            <Typography variant="body2">1 Day Return</Typography>
            <Typography variant="body1">
              ₹ {((data.currentValue * data.oneDayReturn) / 100).toFixed(0)} (
              {data.oneDayReturn}%)
            </Typography>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>

        <Box sx={{ mt: 3 }}>
          <Button
            fullWidth
            variant="contained"
            sx={{ backgroundColor: 'green', color: 'white', mb: 1 }}
          >
            + INVEST MORE
          </Button>
          <Button
            fullWidth
            variant="contained"
            sx={{ backgroundColor: '#8e2de2' }}
          >
            GET LOAN AGAINST YOUR INVESTMENTS
          </Button>
        </Box>

        <Box sx={{ mt: 2 }}>
          <Button variant="outlined" sx={{ mx: 1 }}>
            PORTFOLIO
          </Button>
          <Button variant="outlined" sx={{ mx: 1 }}>
            REDEEM
          </Button>
          <Button variant="outlined" sx={{ mx: 1 }}>
            TRANSACTIONS
          </Button>
        </Box>
      </Paper>
    </Container>
  );
}
